mapper.select: select serverzone0_.ID as id, organizati1_.NAME as organizatilName, zone2_.NAME as zoneName, serverzone0_.TYPE as serverType, serverzone0_.MILEAGE as serverMileage, serverzone0_.MIN_MONEY as minMoney, serverzone0_.SONG_HF as serverSong, serverzone0_.WEIGHT_PRICES as serverWeight, serverzone0_.VOLUME_PRICES as serverVolume, 1 as col_9_0_, serverzone0_.CREATE_NAME as createName, serverzone0_.CREATE_TIME as createTime, serverzone0_.MODIFY_NAME as modifyName, serverzone0_.MODIFY_TIME as modifyTime, serverzone0_.STATUS as status from JC_SERVER_ZONE serverzone0_ left outer join JC_SYS_ORGANIZATION organizati1_ on serverzone0_.JC_ORGANIZATION_ID=organizati1_.ID left outer join JC_ZONE zone2_ on serverzone0_.JC_ZONE_ID=zone2_.ID where 1=1 and organizati1_.ID='402881a36710579c016710c4e2fb0230' order by serverzone0_.CREATE_TIME desc limit 5
